trans-unit.source: Provides information for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected"></xref> and <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected"></xref> events.
The `SpeechRecognitionRejected` event is raised by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: A `SpeechRecognitionRejected` esemény jelenik meg, amelyet a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>és <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>osztályok.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: **SpeechRecognitionRejected** events are generated by a speech recognition engine when none of the alternates from a recognition operation have a high enough confidence score to be accepted.
trans-unit.target: **SpeechRecognitionRejected** események által a beszédfelismerést hozhatók létre, amikor egy felismerés műveletből helyettesek egyik sincs el kell fogadni elég magas megbízhatósági pontszámot.

trans-unit.source: Detailed information about rejected phrases is available through the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A visszautasított kifejezések kapcsolatos részletes információk keresztül érhető el a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>
